I.1) Information about the contracting authority;

Procurement of transportation services for students living outside the territory of the City of Skopje for the needs of the school

SHORT_DESCR.P: Public procurement announcement
Announcement number: 11678/2021
Part I: Contracting authority
I.1) Information about the contracting authority;
I.1.1) Name of the contracting authority: SUGS Vlado Tasevski Skopje;
I.1.2) Address: III Makedonska Brigada bb;
I.1.3) City and postal code: Skopje 1000;
I.1.4) Internet address;
I.1.5) Contact person: Dejan Krstevski, e-mail address: kdejank@gmail.com phone/fax: 022400040;
I.1.6) Additional information and tender documentation can be obtained:
At the abovementioned address
I.2) Category of contracting authority, its principal activity or activity:
Legal entities established to meet the needs of public interest — Article 9 paragraph 1 line b) of the Law – Education
Section II: subject of the public procurement contract
II.1) Subject of the public procurement contract:
Procurement of transportation services for students living outside the territory of the City of Skopje for the needs of the school
II.1.1) Publication of estimated value No
II.2) Type of public procurement contract: Services — Service category number: 20 Additional transport services
Consulting services No
Place of delivery of goods or performance of services, or location of performance of works: School
II.3) Sector agreement No
II.4) Central body No
II.5) Group procurement No
II.6) Electronic catalog: No
II.7) Detailed description of the object of the public procurement contract: Procurement of services for transportation of students living outside of the City of Skopje for the needs of the school
II.8) Common Glossary on Public Procurement: Yes
Basic subject of public procurement - Main glossary
Code Description
60000000-8 Transport services (excluding waste transport)
II.9) Divide procurement No
II.10) Framework agreement: No
II.11) Alternative offers No
II.12) Duration of the contract:
Period in months: 24
II.13) Preliminary market check? No
Part III: Procedure
III.1) Type of procedure: Open procedure
III.2) The procedure for awarding a public procurement contract will be with shortened deadlines: No
III.3) Contract award criterion: Best value for money
Criteria Points
Price 5
Quality 95
III.4) Electronic procedure? Yes
III.5) Electronic auction Yes
Section IV: legal, economic, financial and technical information
IV.1) Guarantees and advance payment
IV.1.1) Bid guarantee: No
IV.1.2) Statement of seriousness: Yes
IV.1.3) Guarantee for quality performance of the contract: Yes [15.00 %]
IV.1.4) Advance payment: No
IV.1.5) Association of a group of economic operators in an appropriate legal form for the purpose of performing the contract (after selection of the most favorable offer): No
IV.1.6) Reserved contracts No
IV.2) Criteria for determining the ability of the bidder or the candidate
IV.2.1) In order to prove the personal condition, the economic operator should submit the following documents
— statement that in the last 5 years no final court verdict has been pronounced for a crime committed by Article 88 paragraph 1 of the Law of Public Procurement;
— certificate that no bankruptcy procedure has been opened by a competent authority;
— certificate that no liquidation procedure has been opened by a competent authority;
— certificate of paid taxes, contributions and other public duties from a competent authority of the country where the economic operator is registered;

— certificate from the Registry of Penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities that no secondary penalty of prohibition to participate in public call procedures, award of public procurement contracts and contracts for Public-Private Partnership;
— certificate from the Registry of Penalties for committed criminal acts of the legal entities that no secondary punishment temporary or permanent prohibition to perform a certain activity;
— certificate that no misdemeanor sanction has been pronounced with a final verdict — prohibition to perform profession, activity or duty, or a temporary prohibition to perform a
